snippet: James Rosemond was like a prince at the royal court, whose ties to rap music’s biggest stars were known far and wide. But a jury found that his real job was as a drug trafficker.
abstract: Federal jury in Brooklyn convicts James Rosemond, notorious in the hip-hop community, of running a sophisticated multimillion-dollar cocaine ring that moved drugs across the country.
lead_paragraph: James Rosemond was like a prince at the royal court, whose ties to rap music’s biggest stars were known far and wide. But a jury found that his real job was as a drug trafficker.

headline.seo: James Rosemond Convicted of Running Multimillion-Dollar Drug Ring
headline.main: Rap Music Figure Convicted of Running Multimillion-Dollar Cocaine Ring
headline.print_headline: Rap Music Figure Convicted of Running Multimillion-Dollar Cocaine Ring
